title: MassRobotics opens applications for fourth Form and Function Robotics Challenge
description:
The latest MassRobotics Form and Function challenge will culminate with in-person demonstrations at the Robotics Summit & Expo.

The post MassRobotics opens applications for fourth Form and Function Robotics Challenge appeared first on The Robot Report.
